title: Ranil requests Parliament debate over IMF report
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The Leader of the United National Party (UNP), Ranil Wickremesinghe has requested for an imediate debate at the Parliament over the IMF report on recovering Sri Lanka’s debt sustainability.
He has stated that it is of utmost importance the Government presents their plan in regard to the report, as the Government has chosen to engage the IMF for financial assistance.
Crude oil prices rise again, Saudi says it is not responsible for any shortage
